Account Officer Job at TNL Pharmaceutical Company




        
    

        
        TNL Pharmaceutical Company is one of the leading pharmaceutical companies in Nigeria.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Account Officer

Job Location: Igando, Lagos 
Employment Type: Full-time

Job  Description
     

            
    




	We are seeking a motivated Account Officer to join our finance team. This entry-level role is ideal for a fresh graduate with a strong academic background in accounting, who has completed the NYSC program and possesses excellent skills in Microsoft Excel.
	The successful candidate will support daily financial operations, ensure accurate record-keeping, and contribute to the overall efficiency of the accounting department.


Key Responsibilities


	Maintain accurate financial records and documentation.
	Assist in preparing financial statements and reports.
	Handle accounts payable and receivable transactions.
	Reconcile bank statements and company accounts.
	Support budgeting and forecasting activities.
	Use Microsoft Excel to analyze data, prepare reports, and manage spreadsheets.
	Ensure compliance with company policies and accounting standards.
	Provide administrative support to the finance team as required.


Requirements


	Education: B.Sc. in Accounting
	Experience: Fresh graduate (no prior work experience required).
	Mandatory: Completion of NYSC program.
	Proficiency in Microsoft office.
	Attention to detail and accuracy.
	Good communication and interpersonal skills.
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team.


Salary
N70,000 - N100,000 / month.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidate should send their CV and Cover Letter to: tnlrecruitment01@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "IT Application Support Manager",
  "description": "Olam Agri is a market-leading, differentiated food, feed, and fiber agri-business with a global origination footprint, processing capabilities, and deep understanding of market needs built over 33 years. With a strong presence in high-growth emerging markets and products across grains &amp; oilseeds, animal feed &amp; protein, rice, edible oils, specialty grains &amp; seeds, cotton, wood products, rubber and commodity financial services.

Olam Agri is at the heart of global food and agri-trade flows with more than 40 million MT in volume traded annually. Focused on transforming food, feed and fiber for a more sustainable future, it aims at creating value for customers, enabling farming communities to prosper sustainably, and strive for a food-secure future.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;IT Application Support Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Nigeria

Job Description


	As an&nbsp;IT Application Support Specialist &ndash; SAP, you will play a crucial role in ensuring the smooth operation of our SAP systems, supporting business operations across Nigeria.
	This role demands technical expertise, problem-solving skills, and effective collaboration with cross-functional teams.


Responsibilties
Provide Level 2/3 SAP Application Support:


	Troubleshoot and resolve complex SAP issues.
	Deliver timely and effective solutions to user queries and incidents.
	Conduct root cause analysis and implement preventive measures.


Manage SAP Incidents and Service Requests:


	Prioritize and manage incidents and service requests in alignment with defined SLAs and KPIs.
	Escalate issues to relevant teams when necessary.


Key Deliverables


	Proficient in SAP modules:&nbsp;PP (Production Planning), QM (Quality Management), and MM (Materials Management).
	Strong understanding of SAP master data requirements.
	Prior experience in managing SAP service requests (L1 tickets).
	Solid knowledge of business processes:&nbsp;Procure-to-Pay, Produce-to-Finish, Order-to-Cash.

IT Application Support Manager Job at Olam Agri




        
    

        
        Olam Agri is a market-leading, differentiated food, feed, and fiber agri-business with a global origination footprint, processing capabilities, and deep understanding of market needs built over 33 years. With a strong presence in high-growth emerging markets and products across grains & oilseeds, animal feed & protein, rice, edible oils, specialty grains & seeds, cotton, wood products, rubber and commodity financial services.

Olam Agri is at the heart of global food and agri-trade flows with more than 40 million MT in volume traded annually. Focused on transforming food, feed and fiber for a more sustainable future, it aims at creating value for customers, enabling farming communities to prosper sustainably, and strive for a food-secure future.
     

            
    



We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: IT Application Support Manager

Job Location: Nigeria

Job Description


	As an IT Application Support Specialist – SAP, you will play a crucial role in ensuring the smooth operation of our SAP systems, supporting business operations across Nigeria.
	This role demands technical expertise, problem-solving skills, and effective collaboration with cross-functional teams.


Responsibilties
Provide Level 2/3 SAP Application Support:


	Troubleshoot and resolve complex SAP issues.
	Deliver timely and effective solutions to user queries and incidents.
	Conduct root cause analysis and implement preventive measures.


Manage SAP Incidents and Service Requests:


	Prioritize and manage incidents and service requests in alignment with defined SLAs and KPIs.
	Escalate issues to relevant teams when necessary.


Key Deliverables


	Proficient in SAP modules: PP (Production Planning), QM (Quality Management), and MM (Materials Management).
	Strong understanding of SAP master data requirements.
	Prior experience in managing SAP service requests (L1 tickets).
	Solid knowledge of business processes: Procure-to-Pay, Produce-to-Finish, Order-to-Cash.
	Experience working on key projects involving SAP and other applications.
	Effective individual contributor and collaborative team player.


Strategic Effectiveness:


	Lead and manage the Level 1 application support team within a manufacturing environment, ensuring timely and effective issue resolution.
	Ensure stability and optimal performance of SAP applications.
	Coordinate and collaborate with business users, vendor teams, and internal IT teams to deliver robust application solutions and enhancements.
	Drive and manage medium-to-large scale SAP projects from inception to completion, ensuring delivery within scope, time, and budget.
	Analyze and interpret data to generate insightful management reports for informed decision-making.
	Act as a liaison between technical teams and business stakeholders, translating technical concepts into business terms and vice versa.
	Champion continuous improvement in application support processes.


Requirements


	Minimum of 8 years of hands-on experience with SAP applications.
	Proven experience in managing Level 1 application support in a manufacturing environment.
	Strong analytical skills with a keen aptitude for data analysis and management reporting.
	Demonstrated experience in leading and managing IT projects, particularly within SAP.
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively across diverse stakeholder groups.
	Exposure to Tableau or other Business Intelligence (BI) reporting tools is a plus.
	Proactive, problem-solving mindset with a commitment to continuous improvement.

	The Sales and Marketing Manager will be responsible for developing and executing commercial strategies to drive revenue growth, expand market presence, and optimize product sales across domestic and international markets.
